210

1 x 1 x 5 x 3 x 7 x 2 x 1
d1 -> 1
d10 (10 + 9)/2 = 9.5 -> 10 -> 1
d100 (100 + 9)/2 = 54.5 -> 55 -> 5
d1000 (1000 + 99 + 9)/3 = 369.3 -> 379 -> 3
d10000 (10000 + 999 + 99 + 9)/4 = 2776.75 -> 2777 -> 7
d100000 (100000 + 9999 + 999 + 99 + 9)/5 -> 22221.2 -> 22222 -> 2
d1000000 (1000000 + 99999 + 9999 + 999 + 99 + 9)/6 -> 185184.16 -> 185185 -> 1
